data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of São Domingos to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of São Domingos, Cape Verde
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Please, teach the 1,187 believers in São Domingos, Cape Verde how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.section_summary: On average, 5 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next month in São Domingos, Cape Verde.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in São Domingos, Cape Verde. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of São Domingos, Cape Verde.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in São Domingos, Cape Verde know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in São Domingos, Cape Verde to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in São Domingos, Cape Verde, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.
